title: Short Nonfiction Collection Vol. 024
creator: Various
description: LibriVox recording of Short Nonfiction Collection Vol. 024 by Various Authors. Read by LibriVox Volunteers A collection of short nonfiction works in the public domain. The selections included in this collection were independently chosen by the readers, and the topics encompass gardening, military history, humor, climate change, travel and religion. (summary by J. M. Smallheer) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobooks; nonfiction; essays; speeches; military history; Mark Twain, Abner Doubleday; U. S. civil war;  John F. Kennedy; Red Cross; England; travel; religion; geraniums; climate; Scientific American; bicycles; Governor John Winthrop
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
